text: Location of Medzilaborce District in the Prešov Region. Zbudská Belá () is a village and municipality in the Medzilaborce District in the Prešov Region of far north-eastern Slovakia. ==History== In historical records the village was first mentioned in 1463. ==Geography== The municipality lies at an altitude of 272 metres and covers an area of 15.973 km². It has a population of about 130 people. ==External links== *https://web.archive.org/web/20071116010355/http://www.statistics.sk/mosmis/eng/run.html Category:Villages and municipalities in Medzilaborce District Category:Zemplín (region)
title: Zbudská Belá
